attributes.action: To stop calorie labelling being mandatory for restaurants and cafes.

I personally am in recovery from an eating disorder and I find calories on menus very distressing as many companies have already started labelling menus and this can cause me to not eat either in that restaurant or the rest of the day. 
An alternative option could be to have separate menu that you could request with the calories on it.
attributes.background: To stop making calorie labelling on menus for food businesses as this has a huge negative impact on people suffering with eating disorders of all kinds.
